verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Oh, can we say we are
ready, brother?
Ready for the soulâ€™s
bright home?

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Say, will He find
you and me still watching,
Waiting, waiting when
the Lord shall come?

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
When Jesus comes
to reward His servants,
Whether it be noon or night,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Faithful to Him will
He find us watching,
With our lamps all
trimmed and bright?

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
If, at the dawn
of the early morning,
He shall call us one by one,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
When to the Lord
we restore our talents,
Will He answer thee-
Well done?

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Have we been true
to the trust He left us?

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Do we seek to do our best?
If in our hearts there is naught condemns us,
We shall have glorious rest.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
If He shall come
at the dawn or midnight,
Will He find us
watching there?
